original: Årmann, Raoul Nils Alvar, överste, Jönköping, f. 28/11/95 i Stora Mellö-sa, Örebro 1., av godsäg. Nils A. o. Alva Lange. G. 22 m. grev:an Eva Wachtmeister, d. 47. Barn: Ulla f. 23’, g. m. ’hovr lassess. T. Ahlgren, Elisabeth 25, Gunilla 31. — Stud:ex. i Örebro 13. Fänrik v. Smål. art:reg. 15, löjtn. 18, v. artistaben 26, kapt. v. Bodens art:reg. 28, major v. artistabs-kåren 37, övilöjtn. 39, överste 41, stabschef v. art:insp. 40, chef f. Smål. art:reg. sed. 42. Adjut. h. H. K. H. Kronprinsen. KS02kl, RVO, CFBSM, Jönk. 1. bfbSM, LKrVA.
translated: Årmann, Raoul Nils Alvar, Colonel, Jönköping, born November 28, 1895 in Stora Mellö-sa, Örebro 1st, son of landowner Nils A. and Alva Lange. Married in 1922 to Countess Eva Wachtmeister, deceased in 1947. Children: Ulla (born 1923), married to Court Assessor T. Ahlgren; Elisabeth (born 1925); Gunilla (born 1931). Completed high school exams in Örebro in 1913. Enlisted as an ensign in the Småland Artillery Regiment in 1915, promoted to lieutenant in 1918, transferred to the Artillery Staff in 1926, became a captain in the Boden Artillery Regiment in 1928, major in the Artillery Reserve in 1937, promoted to lieutenant colonel in 1939, colonel in 1941, served as the staff chief of the Artillery Inspectorate in 1940, and became the commander of the Småland Artillery Regiment in 1942. Adjutant to His Royal Highness the Crown Prince. Honorary Knight of the Order of the Sword Second Class, Royal Order of Vasa, Commander First Class of the Jönköping First Brigade Medal, and Knight of the Order of the Polar Star.

colleague.name: His Royal Highness the Crown Prince

award.name: Knight of the Order of the Polar Star
